body:
Hi ^^ can anyone solve my problem?

Well, the basic problem is that i recently change my name from TheLostVega to DaishoKoshirae and since i did that i cant enter into my profile configuration or "edit profile"

¿why is this?

Sorry if my english isnt well :p
body_tagged:
Hi ^^ can anyone solve my problem?

Well, the basic problem is that i recently change my name from TheLostVega to DaishoKoshirae and since i did that i cant enter into my profile configuration or "edit profile"

title: I need some help with my account

replies.body: It works :D thanks a lot dude <3
replies.body_tagged: It works :D thanks a lot dude <3

replies.body:
This didn't have anything to do with your name change.
I believe it's a known bug that will be fixed.

If anyone else is having a similar problem, follow kycrafft's example by putting "/users" before your name in the URL.

Thanks.
